constituent: overpowering, tall, top hat, mouth, crown, sow, pig
hint: In Orwell´s ´Animal Farm´ the pigs overpowered every other animals. They crownded themselves as ruler of the farm and walked tall on their rear legs, a crime strictly forbidden in the animal republic.
koohiiStory1: In Orwell´s ´Animal Farm´ the pigs overpowered every other animals. They crownded themselves as ruler of the farm and walked tall on their rear legs, a crime strictly forbidden in the animal republic.
koohiiStory2: Ganon, the tall crowned pig, has been overpowering ther land of Hyrule for decades.

words:
